subject: Football
College Athletics
Social Networking (Internet)
lead_paragraph: In the era of Twitter, Facebook and Deadspin.com, the notion of a quaint campus life for top players has all but vanished, killed off by cloying fans and new technology.
snippet: In the era of Twitter, Facebook and Deadspin.com, the notion of a quaint campus life for top players has all but vanished, killed off by cloying fans and new technology.
